html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-09612010-08-04,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActNova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE NOVA SCOTIA AND NEWFOUNDLAND AND LABRADOR ADDITIONAL FISCAL EQUALIZATION OFFSET PAYMENTS REGULATIONS, in order to prescribe the determination of per capita net debt required to evaluate one of the conditions that must be fulfilled for Nova Scotia to be eligible for additional fiscal equalization offset payments during the eight-year period beginning April 1, 2012 and ending March 31, 2020.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Nova Scotia  and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Regulations
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE NOVA SCOTIA AND NEWFOUNDLAND AND LABRADOR ADDITIONAL FISCAL EQUALIZATION OFFSET PAYMENTS REGULATIONS, in order to prescribe the determination of per capita net debt required to evaluate one of the conditions that must be fulfilled for Nova Scotia to be eligible for additional fiscal equalization offset payments during the eight-year period beginning April 1, 2012 and ending March 31, 2020.
